location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to Captain G Walker, the Senior Marine Officer in the Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the movements of the Antelope, Amherst, and Elphinstone; two cruisers would need to be stationed on the Pearl Banks during the approaching fishing season, between Aboothabee [Abu Dhabi] and Bahrine [Bahrain], the former of which places could be fixed on as the extreme eastern limit of the cruising ground.
